channel.title: ToS Mafia - Mafia Chat
channel.description:
katze is the > # **[Color=BF0000] Caporegime [/Color]** > **[Color=BF0000] Mafia Head [/Color]** > > A trusted and loyal lieutenant to the influential Godfather. Not being a fan of the killing part, you instead prefer to read and book keep the mafia's earnings sending your goons to perform the will of the Mafia. For operations such as these, you push aside your disgust and instead remind the goons just why you're in charge around here. > > You may target a member of your team at night, retraining them into another Mafia role of your choosing. The player who is being retrained is roleblocked even through immunity if the retraining succeeds. However, should you be retraining yourself this will be ignored. > Should this ability succeed then you must wait an additional night until you may retrain again. > You may not promote players into unique roles, even if they are already a unique role. > You can communicate with your allies for as long as they are alive. > > Your allies are Wazza the **[Color=BF0000] Mafioso [/Color]**, Universal the **[Color=BF0000] Prankster [/Color]** and jmwjmw27 the **[Color=BF0000] Agent [/Color]**. > > > You win with the **[Color=BF0000] Mafia [/Color]** > You win with **[Color=804080] Witches [/Color]** > You must kill the **[Color=00BF00] Town [/Color]** > You must kill **[Color=FF8000] Arsonists [/Color]** > You must kill **[Color=0040FF] Serial Killers [/Color]**
Wazza is the > # **[Color=BF0000] Mafioso [/Color]** > **[Color=BF0000] Mafia Tactical [/Color]** > > You are a goon, following your Godfather's every command. > It's not all bad though, because when a higher placement opens up in the Mafia you'll be the first to take it. > > Each night you may choose 1 member of the Mafia to shadow. You will carry out their job that night on any target you wish. > You may only do this once per player in the Mafia. > Shadowing a Mafia Head role only grants you their specific passive(s). Night immunity is not applicable. > If a member of the Mafia dies you may permanently assume that role if you wish at any time. > You can communicate with your allies for as long as they are alive. > > Your allies are katze the **[Color=BF0000] Caporegime [/Color]**, Universal the **[Color=BF0000] Prankster [/Color]** and jmwjmw27 the **[Color=BF0000] Agent [/Color]**. > > You win with the **[Color=BF0000] Mafia [/Color]** > You win with **[Color=804080] Witches [/Color]** > You must kill the **[Color=00BF00] Town [/Color]** > You must kill **[Color=FF8000] Arsonists [/Color]** > You must kill **[Color=0040FF] Serial Killers [/Color]**
Universal is the > # **[Color=BF0000] Prankster [/Color]** > **[Color=BF0000] Mafia Deception [/Color]** > > You are the Prankster, who once filled his days pranking others with elaborate jokes. One time, you managed to make somebody believe that his entire family was murdered. Geez, the look on his face when you told him he was pranked! > > Every night you can choose to target 1 player. > Your target's real night results will be replaced with a false night result of your choosing. > The effect you choose will not actually be done; For example, an investigator pranked into thinking he was roleblocked will still receive night results with clues as to which role his target was. However, he will not know for sure if he slept peacefully. > If you are controlled by a witch, you will make your target think they "slept peacefully." > You can communicate with your allies for as long as they are alive. > > Your allies are Wazza the **[Color=BF0000] Mafioso [/Color]**, katze the **[Color=BF0000] Caporegime [/Color]** and jmwjmw27 the **[Color=BF0000] Agent [/Color]**. > > You win with the **[Color=BF0000] Mafia [/Color]** > You win with **[Color=804080] Witches [/Color]** > You must kill the **[Color=00BF00] Town [/Color]** > You must kill **[Color=FF8000] Arsonists [/Color]** > You must kill **[Color=0040FF] Serial Killers [/Color]**
jmwjmw27 is the > # **[Color=BF0000] Agent [/Color]** > **[Color=BF0000] Mafia Support [/Color]** > > You were a brilliant Spy in your early days, one of the best in the country. However, on one mission you were captured - by the Godfather. > To your great surprise, he wanted to help you retire after all your years of service. The deal was simple. Use your talents to collect sensitive information from the townsfolk and he will rule to grant you whatever you want in this silly little town. > > You can choose one player to spy on during the day. You will be informed if this player visits others at night. > Each night you also can plant a bug on a person. The bug will allow you to see who they visit that night, or if they do at all. > As well the bug will inform you what feedback they receive at the end of the night. > You can communicate with your allies for as long as they are alive. > > Your allies are Wazza the **[Color=BF0000] Mafioso [/Color]**, katze the **[Color=BF0000] Caporegime [/Color]** and Universal the **[Color=BF0000] Prankster [/Color]**. > > > You win with the **[Color=BF0000] Mafia [/Color]** > You win with **[Color=804080] Witches [/Color]** > You must kill the **[Color=00BF00] Town [/Color]** > You must kill **[Color=FF8000] Arsonists [/Color]** > You must kill **[Color=0040FF] Serial Killers [/Color]**

item.title: ToS Mafia - Mafia Chat
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
ree, uni/wazza pls no slank scum

also i have a tinfoil theory that sulit is NK

but they might just be a confident citizen

might give that more thought in the coming days

as for retraining; i think both agent/prankster look decent but i could see an argument for retraining the prankster depending if you want to abuse it for your fakeclaim or not (you probably should, tbh. would make for a decent claim)

janitor might not be necessary with so many citizens anyway.

sleep time for me

Read full topic
